name: src/const/signup.js
content:
/**
* サインアップ失敗理由
*/
export const SIGNUP_FAILURE_REASONS = {
  ID_DUPLICATED : "ID_DUPLICATED", //ID重複
  SERVER_ERROR : "SERVER_ERROR", //サーバーエラー
  INVALID_CONFIRM : "INVALID_CONFIRM", //パスワード確認用不一致
  EMPTY_ID : "EMPTY_ID", //IDが空,
  EMPTY_PASSWORD:"EMPTY_PASSWORD", //パスワードが空
  EMPTY_NAME : "EMPTY_NAME", //表示名が空
  POLICY_PASSWORD : "POLICY_PASSWORD" //パスワードポリシーの要件を満たしていない
}

name: SIGNUP_FAILURE_REASONS
description: サインアップ失敗理由

types: {"ID_DUPLICATED": string, "SERVER_ERROR": string, "INVALID_CONFIRM": string, "EMPTY_ID": string, "EMPTY_PASSWORD": string, "EMPTY_NAME": string, "POLICY_PASSWORD": string}

name: src/reducer/root.js
content:
import { combineReducers } from 'redux'
import login from './login';
import mydestination from './mydestination'
import board from './board'
import signup from './signup'
import accountboard from './accountboard'
import suggestion from './suggestion'

/**
* 各reducerを結合してひとまとめにしてexportする
* @see http://qiita.com/kuy/items/59c6d7029a10972cba78
*/
export default combineReducers({
  login,
  mydestination,
  board,
  signup,
  accountboard,
  suggestion,
})

name: it11

name: it12
description: doesn't dispatch any actions when button is clicked if two textboxes are empty

name: it13
description: dispatches LOGIN_REQUESTED ation when button is clicked if two textboxes are not empty

name: test/reducer/login.test.js
describe14
description: login reducer

name: it15
description: changes 'status' state to LOGIN_STATUS.SUCCESS and changes 'user' state to payload of action if LOGIN_SUCCESS action is passed

name: it16
description: changes 'status' state to LOGIN_STATUS.FAILURE and changes 'user' state to empty object if LOGIN_FAILURE action is passed

name: it17
description: changes 'status' state to LOGIN_STATUS.NOTYET and changes 'user' state to empty object if LOGOUT_REQUESTED action is passed

name: it18
description: changes 'status' state to LOGIN_STATUS.NOTYET and changes 'user' state to empty object if LOGIN_REQUESTED action

name: it19
description: doesn't change any state if any other action is passed
